ChangeList.Description: Added the following properties to the [alert](/graph/api/resources/alert?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity:  **incidentIds**, [securityResources](/graph/api/resources/securityResource?view=graph-rest-1.0) - **resource**, **resourceType**,[networkConnection](/graph/api/resources/networkconnection?view=graph-rest-1.0) - **sourceLocation**, **destinationLocation**.
The [Update alert](/graph/api/alert-update?view=graph-rest-1.0&tabs=http) method now updates the **comments** field with the following values only: ,  **Closed in IPC**, **Closed in MCAS**.

Added the Secure Score APIs to the [security API](/graph/api/resources/securescore-api-overview?view=graph-rest-1.0), including the following resources and operations:, [secureScore](/graph/api/resources/securescore?view=graph-rest-1.0) (and related entities), [List secureScores](/graph/api/securescores-list?view=graph-rest-1.0), [secureScoreControlProfile](/graph/api/resources/securescorecontrolprofile?view=graph-rest-1.0), [List secureScoreControlProfiles](/graph/api/securescorecontrolprofiles-list?view=graph-rest-1.0), [Update secureScoreControlProfile](/graph/api/securescorecontrolprofiles-update?view=graph-rest-1.0)

ChangeList.Description: Introduced new complex type [historyStates](/graph/api/resources/alerthistorystate?view=graph-rest-beta) collection to alert. </br>Added [updateAlerts](/graph/api/alert-updatealerts?view=graph-rest-beta) functionality to update multiple alerts in one request.

Added the Secure Score APIs to the [security API](/graph/api/resources/securescore-api-overview?view=graph-rest-beta), including the following resources and operations:, [secureScores](/graph/api/resources/securescores?view=graph-rest-beta) (and related entities), [List secureScores](/graph/api/securescores-list?view=graph-rest-beta), [secureScoreControlProfiles](/graph/api/resources/securescorecontrolprofiles?view=graph-rest-beta), [List secureScoreControlProfiles](/graph/api/securescorecontrolprofiles-list?view=graph-rest-beta), [Update secureScoreControlProfiles](/graph/api/securescorecontrolprofiles-update?view=graph-rest-beta)
